dublin_core.dcvalue: US Army soldiers diagnosed with type 1 diabetes were previously considered unfit for duty For highly motivated soldiers current advanced technologies allow the possibility of not only retention on active duty but military deployment We present our experience at Fort Bragg North Carolina taking care of soldiers newly diagnosed with type 1 diabetes mellitus Through intensive diabetes education extensive military and physical training optimization of diabetes technology and remote real time monitoring soldiers are able to continue to serve their country in the most specialized roles
Journal of diabetes science and technology
US Army Soldiers With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus.
